pages.title: Crops
pages.text: In order to encourage $(bold)$(l:getting_started)Automation/$, $(item)Crops/$, as well as other plants such as $(item)Cacti/$, $(item)Sugar Cane/$, or $(item)Saplings/$, have had their growth slowed down significantly.
The effectiveness of $(item)Bone Meal/$ has been reduced, only providing a single stage of growth each time it is used, again to encourage automation.
